name: Winter Hippo Pattern
description:
~~~~~ This listing is for the PATTERN of the winter hippo, NOT the actual doll! ~~~~~

Winter Hippo

This is a pattern for a crocheted amigurumi hippo. The pattern includes 6 pages.
The pattern will be sent to your email address as a PDF file within 48 hours from the moment the money is transferred to my PayPal account.
There are no shipping costs!

The hippo's outfit includes a hat, a scarf (the scarf in knitted but can be crocheted instead), a sweater, mittens and boots.
His eyes are embroidered and he is crocheted using worsted weight acrylic yarns.
The doll is approx. 8.5” (21.59 cm) tall


Materials needed:

Worsted weight acrylic yarn in light blue/aqua, red, yellow and dark blue/jeans blue
Black embroidery thread
Sewing thread
Crochet hook 3.5mm/E-4
Knitting needles 3.5mm/4 for the scarf (not a must)
Stitch markers
Tapestry needle
Embroidery needle
Sewing needle
Polyester fiberfill
Two small red buttons


Copyright © 2007-2008 Velouria. All Rights Reserved.
The written instructions, photographs, designs and patterns are intended for personal use only.
Any other use, especially commercial use, is forbidden under law without written permission of the copyright holder.

name: Ballerina Hippo Pattern
description:
~~~~~ This listing is for the PATTERN of the ballerina hippo, NOT the actual doll! ~~~~~

Ballerina Hippo

This is a pattern for a crocheted amigurumi hippo. The pattern includes 7 pages.
The pattern will be sent to your email address as a PDF file within 48 hours from the moment the money is transferred to my PayPal account.
There are no shipping costs!

The hippo's outfit includes a pink top, a tutu skirt, toe shoes and a bun cover.
Her eyes are embroidered and she is crocheted using worsted weight acrylic yarns.
The doll is approx. 9.8” (25 cm) tall


Materials needed:

Worsted weight acrylic yarn in pink
Worsted weight acrylic yarn in light blue/aqua
Decorations such as ribbons, sequins, beads, etc.
2 shades of pink Tulle fabric
Black embroidery thread
Sewing thread
Crochet hook 3.5mm/E
Crochet hook 2.5mm/C
Stitch markers
Tapestry needle
Embroidery needle
Sewing needle
Sewing pins
Polyester fiberfill



Copyright © 2008 Velouria. All Rights Reserved.
The written instructions, photographs, designs and patterns are intended for personal use only.
Any other use, especially commercial use, is forbidden under law without written permission of the copyright holder.
Added on Jun 2, 2008

name: Summer Hippo Pattern
description:
~~~~~ This listing is for the PATTERN of the Summer hippo, NOT the actual doll! ~~~~~

Summer Hippo

This is a pattern for a crocheted amigurumi hippo. The pattern includes 8 pages.
The pattern will be sent to your email address as a PDF file within 48 hours from the moment the money is transferred to my PayPal account.
There are no shipping costs!

The hippo's outfit includes a mint green 2 piece swimsuit, beach sandals, a swim ring and a cap.
Her eyes are embroidered and she is crocheted using worsted weight acrylic yarns.
The doll is approx. 8.8” (22.3 cm) tall


Materials needed:

Worsted weight acrylic yarn in lilac
Worsted weight acrylic yarn in light blue/aqua
Worsted weight acrylic yarn in mint green
Worsted weight acrylic yarn in white
A few scraps of worsted weight acrylic yarn in yellow
Black embroidery thread
Sewing thread
Crochet hook 3.5mm/E
Crochet hook 4.0mm/F (optional)
Stitch markers
Tapestry needle
Embroidery needle
Sewing pins
Polyester fiberfill



Copyright © 2008 Velouria. All Rights Reserved.
The written instructions, photographs, designs and patterns are intended for personal use only.
Any other use, especially commercial use, is forbidden under law without written permission of the copyright holder.
